short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any Indian alphabet into another.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension transliterates i.e. converts any character in a web page that is encoded in a unicode / utf-8 in an Indian language (Hindi, Bangla, Gujarati, Gurmukhi (Punjabi), Kannada, Malayalam, Oriya, Tamil, Telugu) into a target Indian language. The default target is Hindi. Thus, one can view a Punjabi web page in Hindi alphabet, where the words are still Punjabi words i.e. they are not translated.
